reactor.netty.channel

Class AbstractChannelMetricsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • reactor.netty.channel.AbstractChannelMetricsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelMetricsHandler, MicrometerChannelMetricsHandler

    public abstract class AbstractChannelMetricsHandler
extends ChannelDuplexHandler
    Base ChannelHandler for collecting metrics on protocol level.
    Since:
    1.0.8
    Author:
    Violeta Georgieva
